page.title: 06Media Free Newspapers
page.content: In Stansted Mountfitchet we have 7 free newspapers a week, 6 on Thursday and 1 on wednesday. They are the Gazette, the Property Paper, the Reporter, the Midweek Star, the Motoring Paper, the Saffron Walden Weekly News and the Clasified. Each week we get 600 gms weight of free newspapers and during the year we get 31.2 kgms weight and 9360 pages of free papers. For delivering 159 copies of the Saffron Walden Weekly News, a paper girls weekly wage is Â£2.95p. I wondered where the money came from for the papers. I looked through the Gazette and worked out that 70% of the paper was made up of advertisments which the advertisers pay for. With the kind permission of the editor Mr Kenneth Burley I visited the Harlow Gazette Office to see a paper being made.
